name: Butterfly Soup (itch)
description:
This is the first game I ever made, so it's not perfect, but I had a lot of fun making it and I hope you have some fun playing it!

 Butterfly Soup 

You, a butterfly, find yourself in a forest. But it's not just any forest...it's home to Chef Flappy, the hungriest chef in the world. And you're just what he needs to make his favourite meal: butterfly soup. Escape before he catches you!

CREDITS:

Sound effects: https://zapsplat.com/ 

Music: https://zapsplat.com/ and https://www.dl-sounds.com/ 

Chef Flappy Game Asset: bevouliin (https://bevouliin.com/) 

Other Game Assets: https://www.gameartguppy.com/ 

Parallax Forest Background: EDER via Unity Asset Store (edermunizz.tumblr.com/)

Game Font: Ruslan Kudriachenko via Unity Asset Store (www.thepirateparrot.com)

Butterfly: Butterfly spritesheet via Abdul Hamid Giwa on Pinterest (https://www.pinterest.ca/abdulhameed/sprite/)
